All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BearerAuthenticationFilter
BearerAuthenticationFilter is a custom filter that processes HTTP requests to authorize users based on a preauthentication Bearer token provided in the Authorization header.
FilesAccess
Service class for managing file access operations.
FilesCache
Service class for managing a cache of file names.
FilesController
The FilesController class handles HTTP requests related to file operations such as retrieving file size, fetching files, searching files, uploading new files, updating existing files, and deleting files.
FilesNameSupplier
A component that supplies random file names.
FilesPostFileResponse
A response record for a file post operation.
FilesSearchResponse
A record that represents the response for a file search operation.
FilesSizeResponse
A record that represents the response containing the size of files.
GlobalExceptionHandler
GlobalExceptionHandler is a controller advice class that handles exceptions thrown by any controller in the application.
SecurityConfig
Security configuration class for the web application.
WebdiskApplication
The main entry point for the Webdisk application.
